name: seneca-populate
description: Seneca plugin for user and populate permissions.

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm i --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && npm run prettier && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --access public --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org

author: Richard Rodger (richardrodger.com)
